songs.title: Tell Me If You Need It
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
No one's in your way
Tell me if you need it
I wanna roll, 'till the wheels fall off me
Wheezy outta here
Yeah

[Pre-Chorus]
Told you not to fall in love with me (Yeah)
I shouldn't acted like I love you (Yeah)
I was in the 'Ghini, I let the doors up (Yeah)
Chop the top off and I roll up (Yeah)
I'ma change my name to slime Sosa (Yeah)
Prove that you Haitian, do the salsa (Yeah)
Smoke hella trees, like a stoner (Yeah)
Green diamonds when you at the swamp (Yeah)

[Chorus]
You should tell me if you need it (Yeah)
Tell me if you need it (Yeah)
Tell me if you need it
Ohh, ohh

[Post-Chorus]
Tell me if you need it, it, it, it, it
Tell me if you need it, it, it, it, it
I wanna know what makes you happy, baby
Tell me if you need it, need it

[Verse 1]
Bought Giuseppe Zanotti
Chase that bag, like Sonic
I'ma caress your body
You gon' need a new alignment
'Bout to get your crew poppin', yeah
Turn you up, you a two, top ten
Versace rag, yeah
Drip at the maximum
Playin' at the Mayard gym
Cops ain't harassin' him
You said you ready this minute
Trip you down, leave in a minute
I make this ninety off the brick
Cover me in, I'ma trend
Nothin' less than a hunnid racks on me
'Cause I came from lint
Most of your hoes and your homies
Be ready to snitch (Yeah)

[Pre-Chorus]
Told you not to fall in love with me (Yeah)
I shouldn't acted like I love you (Yeah)
I was in the 'Ghini, I let the doors up (Yeah)
Chop the top off and I roll up (Yeah)
I'ma change my name to slime Sosa (Yeah)
Prove that you Haitian, do the salsa (Yeah)
Smoke hella trees, like a stoner (Yeah)
Green diamonds when you at the swamp (Yeah)
Wheezy outta here

[Chorus]
You should tell me if you need it (Yeah)
Tell me if you need it (Yeah)
Tell me if you need it
Ohh, ohh
Wheezy outta here

[Interlude]
Huh
Ahh
Ahh
Ah

[Verse 2]
Yellow diamonds, no Funyun
Take my child out your stomach, yeah
Got me speakin' ebonics, mm
See, see, see, see Chinese bitches on me right now
I gotta re-up, can't spend this cheese up
She got good brains like Einstein
Take a trip to Rio, neck on subzero
I pick out the measles
Don't trip on my people
G-Unit, [?]
Got gold on my teeth, too
I got Rollies and Pateks
Chinese bitch eatin' seafood
Pour up a tall cup, RIP to Fredo
I was 'bout to pour it out for Yams, too
Thank god I ran up mills with no scandal
My momma and my aunt's Black Panthers like Cam Newton
Yeah

[Pre-Chorus]
Told you not to fall in love with me (Yeah)
I shouldn't acted like I love you (Yeah)
I was in the 'Ghini, I let the doors up (Yeah)
Chop the top off and I roll up (Yeah)
I'ma change my name to slime Sosa (Yeah)
Prove that you Haitian, do the salsa (Yeah)
Smoke hella trees, like a stoner (Yeah)
Green diamonds when you at the swamp (Yeah)

[Chorus]
You should tell me if you need it (Yeah)
Tell me if you need it (Yeah)
Tell me if you need it
Ohh, ohh

[Post-Chorus]
Tell me if you need it, it, it, it, it
Tell me if you need it, it, it, it, it
I wanna know what makes you happy, baby
Tell me if you need it, need it

[Interlude]
Ahh
Huh
Ahh
Ah
